EmailTemplate.name: EMEA_Email_Spring Drip and Nurture_Q119.Email 1 - Spring Intro
EmailTemplate.subject: Improve ease of coding with the latest features of Spring
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=}},
As technology evolves at an overwhelming speed, there has never been a better time to be a developer. Developers using Spring will accelerate application development at start-up speed leveraging the latest features to minimise time to production, improve ease of coding and increase efficiency.
Visit our website <[[https://spring.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=E1-spring.io-default]]> to learn about our Spring Framework 5.0 and how you can automate ops for Spring Cloud on Cloud Foundry.
Thanks, The Pivotal Team
Attend SpringOne Tour <[[https://springonetour.io/?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=E1-s1default]]> in a city near you, Paris or Istanbul, a Java developer community event. Use discount code S1Tour2019_100 for £50/€50 off ticket price of £150/€150
© 2018 Pivotal Software, Inc. 875 Howard Street, Fifth Floor, San Francisco, CA 94103. Published in the USA. Unsubscribe <[[https://connect.pivotal.io/UnsubscribePage.html]]>. Manage your subscription preferences <[[https://pivotal.io/subscription-management]]>.
